extendedInfo.description: Where did my favorite note book go, marked with blue Monami pen? When you suddenly miss the memorable moments with your classmate, be it the doodling drawn secretly hiding from a teacher in class or the scribbles done with friends that reminds us of those good old days..  Would you like to recall those memories and doodling made with blue Monani pen that unfolds the story of good times?* Apply the theme to transform your background screen, icon and launcher widget! :D* How to apply a theme  - Install Dodol Launcher (if you haven't yet).  - Press the home button and set the Dodol Launcher as the default home launcher by selecting [Use as default value for this task] or [Always].   - Open the launcher menu by swiping the home screen upwards, select the [Theme] menu, then select and apply the theme of your choice.** Precaution- Is available only in Android ver. 4.0.2 and above (ICS, Jellybean)- Some functions cannot  be applied in certain devices.* Customer Supporthttp://dodolhome.blog.me* Why Dodol Launcher is so special  - Cute, simple, vibrant, sophisticated, cuddly and warm themes are continuously updated  - The default widget offers convenient functions, including quick switch and memory cleaner  - Apps/widget can be used easily with the dock and alert shortcut list  - Offers functions that can be used to decorate fonts/ringtones/keyboards  - Offers detailed functions for screen rotation/individual icons/folders etc...  - Supports functions in a convenient and stable manner by copying the home screen and creating backups of settings
